description:
Introducing MEC’s pinnacle of performance outerwear, the Couloir Gore-Tex Pro Bib Pants. Rugged Gore-Tex Pro construction with a water repellant finish is like wearing a suit of armour against the elements. Thanks to the Mico Grid Backer technology, the inner membrane is protected from abrasion while sliding smoothly over layers. Two-way side zippers let you dump heat when you're skinning or bootpacking and reinforced kick patches shield pant legs from sharp crampons or ski edges. Articulated patterning means you can move freely, whether kicking steps up a gully or busting out your signature victory dance at the summit.

  • Super durable 3-layer Gore-Tex Pro construction with a PFC-free DWR finish for enhanced waterproofness
  • Mico Grid Backer technology protects the inner membrane from abrasion while easily sliding over layers
  • Two-way zippers run from the bib to below the knee, allowing ventilation and easy on and off
  • AquaGuard® zippers and fully taped seams keeps you dry in howling conditions
  • Adjustable suspenders fine tune the fit
  • Gusseted crotch and articulated patterning facilitate dynamic moves in mountain environments
  • Two zippered thigh pockets and a chest pocket that fits a beacon
  • Internal gaiters keep snow on the outside where it belongs
  • Kevlar® reinforced kick patches protect against damage from boots, crampons and ski edges
  • Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows ski patrol and mountain rescue teams to detect and locate it under snow
  • Pairs perfectly with the Couloir Gore-Tex Pro Jacket for a backcountry-ready system
name: MEC Couloir Gore-Tex Pro Bib - Men's
